Text: works just like 2011 kg
just download the trial from autodesk install as trial and then activate w/ kg at any time. 696 69696969 till filled for serial # and the product key is 001D1 for autocad 2012

whoops, I think I commented on the wrong download.  I can't use the crack.  When I click mem patch it says 'you need to apply patch when licence screen appears'  I've tried clicking it on every screen that pops up, to no avail.

So I tried just going ahead with the code.  I put my request code in and hit generate.  The code never works (gives me an error number (0015.111)).  The activation code is 7 characters short of filling the boxes.

My request code is: 4JSZ ZSSF YKZK AAR7 HET9 5SHL ULFV ZETZ if that helps any.

Thanks for trying anyway

well I got the 2008 copy working, so yay for that, at least I have a proper cad program now.  I really wish I could get this one to work though, the inventor fusion program thats bundled with it is really quite special.  Not to mention the ease of use of 2012 version.  It's so easy a retarded monkey with no arms and parkinsons disease could design the next building in dubai.

Make sure you are running the Keygen as administrator and with UAC off on Vista or Windows7.
If still not working will try to make a video how to activate.

At activation I got a white box with nothing in it. What did I wrong?

When using the crack, make sure you delete the "Paste Here", so that ONLY the activation code is there. The code should be long enough to put 1 character in the last box. If you leave the Paste Here you will get the wrong code.
